description: NRCan is carrying out restoration services to rehabilitate previously forested land base on 5 Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown. The objectif is to seleec restoration contractor to plant 572,000 seedlings.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Restoration Planting Services
#### Reference: PW-23-01028081
#### Solicitation Number: NRCan - 5000072578

**Tender Overview**

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking a contractor to provide restoration planting services for rehabilitative purposes on the Canadian Division Support Base Gagetown (CDSB). The scope of work involves planting 572,000 seedlings in the Spring of 2023.

#### Key Dates

* **Publication Date**: February 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 29, 2023, 13:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 24, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 20, 2023

#### Documentation

The following documents are attached to this tender announcement:

* [Annex E - RSO, 2018 - English Version 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/b5c77694b9e5e74962aa0641da1b73ec/annex_e_rso_-_2018_-_english_version_1.pdf)
* [Annex F - UXO Training - Waiver (English and French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/a36424f28263ef8e81394ef3a4193e57/annex_f_-_uxo_training_-_waiver_english_and_french.pdf)
* [Annex G - Planting Quality Inspection Guide](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/28/2a1c9b11ae1cb3fad471610ed7e68198/annex_g_planting_quality_inspection_guide.pdf)

#### Trade Agreements

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
